name: Charles WILLIAMS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE and Department of Corrections, Appellees

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of August, 2012, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
